medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient experienced vague lower abdominal pressure that became progressively more painful over 24 hours. Pain became severe to the point that she was unable to ambulate. She noted decreased PO intake, minor nausea, and baseline constipation. No emesis, fevers, chills, chest pain, shortness of breath, or dysuria reported.
medical_history.family_history: Negative for IBD or colon cancer/other GI malignancy
